title: MongoDB with Node.js
subject: MongoDB
theory: Node.js and MongoDB are the M and N in MEAN/MERN stack. You can use the native 'mongodb' driver for control or 'Mongoose' for schema modeling. Connecting involves a URI.

common_mistakes.mistake: Opening a new connection per request
common_mistakes.correction: Connect ONCE on app startup and reuse the client/db object. Handshakes are expensive.

interview_questions.question: What is Mongoose?
interview_questions.answer: It is an Object Data Modeling (ODM) library for MongoDB and Node.js, providing schema validation and relationship management.

summary: Node.js + MongoDB is an extremely popular combination for full-stack JS development.
